info.name: MIDI Mapping for Pioneer DDJ-400
info.author: Marc Linde
info.description: This is a Midi Mapping for the Pioneer DDJ-400

control.description: PAD 1 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 1 Beat left
PAD 1 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 1 Beat left
MASTER LEVEL - rotate - Master gain
PAD 3 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 2 Beats left
PAD 3 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 2 Beats left
PAD 5 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 4 Beats left
PAD 5 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 4 Beats left
HEADPHONES MIXING - rotate - Monitor Balance
PAD 7 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 8 Beats left
PAD 7 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 8 Beats left
PAD 2 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/2 Beatloop
PAD 2 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/2 Beatloop
PAD 4 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 2 Beatloop
PAD 4 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 2 Beatloop
PAD 6 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 8 Beatloop
JOG DIAL PLATTER +SHIFT (DECK1) - touch - enabe (on touch) / disable (on release) highspeed Pitch bend
PAD 6 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 8 Beatloop
JOG DIAL PLATTER +SHIFT (DECK2) - touch - enabe (on touch) / disable (on release) highspeed Pitch bend
PAD 8 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 32 Beatloop
HOT CUE (DECK1) +Shift - press - activate Keyboard mode
PAD 8 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 32 Beatloop
HOT CUE (DECK2) +Shift - press - activate Keyboard mode
LOOP IN/4 BEAT (DECK1) - press - (loop off) set Loop point, (loop on) adjust loop in point with jog wheel
LOOP IN/4 BEAT (DECK2) - press - (loop off) set Loop point, (loop on) adjust loop in point with jog wheel
PAD 1 (DECK1) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 1 (DECK2) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
FILTER CH2 - rotate - Filter Effect Knob
PAD 3 (DECK1) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
LOOP IN/4 BEAT LONG PRESS (DECK1) - press - Enable Auto 4 Beat loop
PAD 3 (DECK2) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
LOOP IN/4 BEAT LONG PRESS (DECK2) - press - Enable Auto 4 Beat loop
PAD 5 (DECK1) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 5 (DECK2) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
CUE/LOOP CALL LEFT (DECK1) - press - (loop off) Call stored cue/loop, (loop on) Loop cutter *2 (half)
CUE/LOOP CALL LEFT (DECK2) - press - (loop off) Call stored cue/loop, (loop on) Loop cutter *2 (half)
PAD 7 (DECK1) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 7 (DECK2) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 2 (DECK1) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
TEMPO (DECK1) - fader - Tempo control
CUE/LOOP CALL RIGHT (DECK1) - press - (loop off) Call stored cue/loop, (loop on) Loop double
PAD 2 (DECK2) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
TEMPO (DECK2) - fader - Tempo control
CUE/LOOP CALL RIGHT (DECK2) - press - (loop off) Call stored cue/loop, (loop on) Loop double
PAD 4 (DECK1) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 4 (DECK2) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 6 (DECK1) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
TRIM - rotate
PAD 6 (DECK2) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
TRIM - rotate
PAD 8 (DECK1) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 8 (DECK2) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 1 (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 1 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 1 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
MASTER LEVEL - rotate - Master gain
PAD 1 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 3 (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 3 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 3 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 3 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 5(DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
CHANNELFADER - slider
PAD 5 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
CHANNELFADER - slider
PAD 5 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
HEADPHONES MIXING - rotate - Monitor Balance
PAD 5 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 7 (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 7 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 7 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 7 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
BROWSE - press - Move cursor between track list and tree view / open a folder
PAD 2 (DECK1) KEYBOARD MODE - press - +5 Halftone
PAD 2 (DECK1) +Shift KEYBOARD MODE - press - unset hotcue
PAD 2 (DECK2) KEYBOARD MODE - press - +5 Halftone
PAD 2 (DECK2) +Shift KEYBOARD MODE - press - unset hotcue
PAD 4 (DECK1) KEYBOARD MODE - press - +7 Halftone
PAD 4 (DECK1) +Shift KEYBOARD MODE - press - unset hotcue
PAD 4 (DECK2) KEYBOARD MODE - press - +7 Halftone
FILTER CH1 - rotate - Filter Effect Knob
PAD 4 (DECK2) +Shift KEYBOARD MODE - press - unset hotcue
CUE (DECK1) - press - Set/Call Cue, Back Cue
CUE (DECK2) - press - Set/Call Cue, Back Cue
PAD 2 (LEFT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample
PAD 6 (DECK1) KEYBOARD MODE - press - +1 Halftone
PAD 2 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Sample or Load Selected Track into Sampler Pad
PAD 6 (DECK1) +Shift KEYBOARD MODE - press - unset hotcue
PAD 2 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample
PLAY/PAUSE +SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Play/Pause
PAD 6 (DECK2) KEYBOARD MODE - press - +1 Halftone
PAD 2 (RIGHT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Sample or Load Selected Track into Sampler Pad
PLAY/PAUSE +SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Play/Pause
PAD 6 (DECK2) +Shift KEYBOARD MODE - press - unset hotcue
LOAD (DECK2) - press - Load a Track into Deck 2
PAD 4 (LEFT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample
PAD 8 (DECK1) KEYBOARD MODE - press - +3 Halftone
PAD 4 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Sample or Load Selected Track into Sampler Pad
PAD 8 (DECK1) +Shift KEYBOARD MODE - press - Halftone down
PAD 4 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample
PAD 8 (DECK2) KEYBOARD MODE - press - +3 Halftone
PAD 4 (RIGHT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Sample or Load Selected Track into Sampler Pad
PAD 8 (DECK2) +Shift KEYBOARD MODE - press - Halftone down
PAD 6 (LEFT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample
PAD 6 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Sample or Load Selected Track into Sampler Pad
PAD 6 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample
PAD 6 (RIGHT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Sample or Load Selected Track into Sampler Pad
PAD 1 (DECK1) KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone +4
PAD 1 (DECK2) KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone +4
PAD 8 (LEFT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample
PAD 8 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Sample or Load Selected Track into Sampler Pad
PAD 8 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample
RELOOP/EXIT (DECK1) - press - (loop off) Reloop, (loop on) Loop exit
CROSSFADER - slider
PAD 8 (RIGHT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Sample or Load Selected Track into Sampler Pad
RELOOP/EXIT (DECK2) - press - (loop off) Reloop, (loop on) Loop exit
PAD 3 (DECK1) KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone +6
JOG DIAL SIDE (DECK1) - rotate - Pitch bend
JOG DIAL SIDE (DECK2) - rotate - Pitch bend
PAD 3 (DECK2) KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone +6
PAD 5 (DECK1) KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone 0
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode Off (DECK1) - rotate - Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode Off (DECK2) - rotate - Pitch bend
PAD 5 (DECK2) KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone 0
PAD 7 (DECK1) KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone +2
PAD 7 (DECK1) +SHIFT KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone up
PAD 7 (DECK2) KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone +2
PAD 7 (DECK2) +SHIFT KEYSHIFT MODE - press - permanent halftone up
SHIFT (Deck1) - press - Shift
SHIFT (Deck2) - press - Shift
EQ HI - rotate
EQ HI - rotate
LOAD +SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Clone Track from playing Deck
JOG DIAL PLATTER +SHIFT (DECK1) - rotate - Search (Fast Pitch bend)
JOG DIAL PLATTER +SHIFT (DECK2) - rotate - Search (Fast Pitch bend)
PAD 2 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 1 Beat right
PAD 2 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 1 Beat right
EQ MID - rotate
EQ MID - rotate
BROWSE +SHIFT - rotate - Zoom in/out of enlarged waveforms
PAD 4 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 2 Beats right
PAD 4 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 2 Beats right
BEAT SYNC +SHIFT (DECK1) - press - change Tempo range
BEAT SYNC +SHIFT (DECK2) - press - change Tempo range
PAD 6 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 4 Beats right
PAD 6 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 4 Beats right
HEADPHONES LEVEL - rotate - Headphone gain
PAD 1 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/4 Beatloop
EQ LOW - rotate
PAD 1 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/4 Beatloop
EQ LOW - rotate

PAD 8 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 8 Beats right

PAD 3 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/1 Beatloop

LOAD +SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Clone Track from playing Deck
LOOP OUT (DECK1) - press - (loop off) set Loop out point, (loop on) adjust loop out point with jog wheel
FILTER CH1 - rotate - Filter Effect Knob
LOOP OUT (DECK2) - press - (loop off) set Loop out point, (loop on) adjust loop out point with jog wheel
PAD 2 (DECK1) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect
PAD 2 (DECK2) PAD FX 1 MODE - press - Effect

PAD 5 (DECK2) PAD FX 2 MODE - press - Effect
